name: Dodge Away
summary: You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose.
description:
You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can Step after the Strike. If you're a master in Acrobatics, you can move 10 feet on this Step instead of 5 feet.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: You are the target of a melee attack.
